objects.name: WelcomeText
objects.string: Enter the Adress from another clients here:

events.comment: Use a custom server
Use default server

events.name: Get P2P Adress and yourself into the playerlist

events.comment: add broker to the list
Wait for connection confirmation [send from Waiter]
When confirmed, we write the player in the list and also write the username as an objectvariable of IdEntryText, in case of a disconnection (to rewrite the list)
make optical changes to the ConnectText
Use a boolean to prevent multible clicks on a player, who is connected already
Delete paste & remove, once a player is confirmed
tell the player, he is added to the list
if something goes wrong and a peer disconnects
delete the playerfields of the disconnected player
and update the id numbers and position of the other fields
let the player know whats going on

parameters: "A Player disconnected and was removed"+NewLine()+"Try to add them again, or start without"

events.comment: Rewriting the list (to have it sorted)
Rewriting the list using the objects
in case we where in the Start Game loop already, stop it and tell the other to stop aswell
select which player you want to enter the adress of (for manual typing)
Paste the Adress, copied over external chats (massenger, discord, ect..)
Add another player field to the game by creating the relevant objects
Remove a player field from the game
Connect to the player field adress
once, all players to participate are entered and connected, start the connection progress steps

This Connection Procedure is divided into steps since the dataflow is asynchronious. It also helps to debug
It avoids the same P2P events triggered at the same time, which is why we send the "ready" to each individual player, instead of all of them at once
We Use the playerlist structure to send the p2p-events
Connection progress Step1: send the connected player the playerlist as JSON
Connection progress Step2: Wait for response of the player to confirm that he is connected to the others  [send from Waiter]
check if that player was the last one in the list, and if not continue with the next player, by repeating step 1. We check the Playercount +1 since the broker is 0
if the scene variable step was not changed to 1, that means we have connected all the players and can give all players the "go" to change scene. and change the scene for the broker too.
